location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, James Morley, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: * The letter is dated 29 January 1767 but this is almost certainly an error and should read 29 May 1767.The letter gives several items of news:the Sheikh of Charrack [Bandar e Charak] is refusing to return the English vessel seized earlier in the year;Zackey Caun [Zaki Khan] remains at Congoon [Bandar e-Kangan];Bushire merchants continue to leave town, as ordered by Karim Khan.
